short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn plain text into calendar events with 1 easy click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The simplest way to add calendar events. Just highlight event information and save it to Google Calendar with one button.

HOW-TO-
1. Highlight event information with your cursor (ex. "Meeting tomorrow at noon")
2. Click the extension icon
3. Adjust event name/date if needed
4. Click "Add Event" and the event has been added to your Google Calendar!


*Adds event to primary Google Calendar associated with the Google account signed into Chrome

CHANGELOG
-New in version 1.0: Better performance and automatic capitalization of predicted event names
-New in version 0.4: Minor bug fixes
-New in version 0.3: Added link to confirmed event after submission
